snippet: SpaceX, Elon Musk’s rocket company, announces a competition to design and build vehicles for the Hyperloop, a proposed new kind of superfast pneumatic tube for people. It’s also building a test track.
abstract: SpaceX, Elon Musk’s rocket company, announces a competition to design and build vehicles for the Hyperloop, a proposed new kind of superfast pneumatic tube for people. It’s also building a test track.

headline.main: Elon Musk Wants Your Hyperloop Ideas
